price: آيا تا هغه كسان نه دي ليدلي چې د الله په آيتونو كې جګړې کوي، هغوى كوم خوا اړول كيږي؟
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أَنَّىٰ يُصۡرَفُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyāti al-lahi annā yuṣ'rafūna
